// execute table filters on keydown $timeout(function () { $('#jsGrid_' + labelId + ' :input').keydown(function () { var self = this; if (self.timeoutPromise) $timeout.cancel(self.timeoutPromise); if (self.value.length == 0) $('#jsGrid_' + labelId).jsGrid('loadData'); self.timeoutPromise = $timeout(function () { $('#jsGrid_' + labelId).jsGrid('loadData'); }, 200); }); });
